thread.title: Jill Trotta Joins RepairPal's Executive Team as Head of Industry Advocacy and Sales

author: cnbc.com
title: Jill Trotta Joins RepairPal's Executive Team as Head of Industry Advocacy and Sales
text:
SAN FRANCISCO, RepairPal.com , the leading website for automotive service and repair, is proud to announce the promotion of Jill Trotta to Senior Director of Sales and Industry Advocacy. The automotive technology company now features an executive team represented by three women, as Jill joins Jennifer Steeves-Kiss, Chief Product and Marketing Officer, and Kathleen Long, Vice President and GM of RepairPal's Shop Network, out of six total members.
Jill is an ASE Certified Technician with over 25 years of experience in the automotive field. She started out as a technician in the early 1990s and has worked her way through many areas of the industry, including as a service advisor, service manager, parts director, and shop owner. In 2017, Jill was awarded the Auto Care 2017 Woman of Excellence Award by the Women in Auto Care Association.
For the past five years, Trotta has been a critical member of RepairPal's Automotive Group. She was responsible for the team that evaluated thousands of independent repair shops in search of the most technically qualified and customer-focused automotive repair shops in the country for the RepairPal Certified Network. In addition, Jill has advised many shops on how to improve their business practices so they could later achieve RepairPal Certification.
With her outstanding accomplishments in the automotive field, Trotta is proud to work for a company that is committed to hiring and empowering the best person for the job. For the industry as a whole, Jill says, "The tide is starting to turn — women are gaining ground and being put into leadership positions. We are more visible and active than ever – poised to lead the industry into the future."
You might recognize Jill Trotta as "RepairPal Jill" on Twitter and Facebook .
For personalized estimates on car repair and matches to trustworthy, local shops, visit us at RepairPal.com .
About RepairPal
Established in 2007, RepairPal is bringing trust and peace-of-mind to auto repair. At RepairPal.com , consumers have free access to a vast array of invaluable resources for taking care of their cars. The RepairPal Certified Network shows trusted shops that guarantee repairs are done at fair prices with quality parts and an expert, attentive staff. The RepairPal Fair Price Estimator ™ ensures consumers never overpay for car repair again. By visiting RepairPal.com , consumers can get back on the road quickly and safely knowing they'll always receive quality work at fair prices. Learn more at: https://repairpal.com/
